item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS, post:3, topic:327995”]if (starter == 0) { sendFrame126("Select Choice", 14174); sendFrame126("Normal Player", 14175); sendFrame126("Pure Level 90", 14176); }[/quote]
Or my way, which makes it shorter for him if he ever does it again -.-

item.title: Codes
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

you do

if(starter == 0) {
				selectOption("OPTION1", "OPTION2");
}

Add this to your main class(probably named client or clientHandler)

public void selectOption(String op1, String op2) { sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Please Choose.", 2460); sendFrame126(op1, 2461); sendFrame126(op2, 2462); sendFrame164(2459); }

Read full topic
